about_the_game:
19 officers will be able to wear fantasy costumes by selecting CHANGE OUTFIT.
Enjoy a breath of fresh air in your favorite stages with these unique costumes.

This set features costumes for the following characters:
Cai Wenji, Jia Xu, Ding Feng, Lianshi, Liu Shan, Ma Dai, Guan Suo, Bao Sanniang, Sima Shi, Sima Zhao, Ding Feng, Wang Yuanji, Zhong Hui, Zhuge Dan, Xiahou Ba, Guo Huai, Wang Yi, Pang De, Guo Jia

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core2 DUO 2.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 640*480 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® Vista, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1
  • Processor: Core i7 860 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280*720 pixel over　※No 4K compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
